name: Rad (itch)
description:
Rad is a 3D-Platformer Collect-A-Thon inspired by platformers from the late 90's and early 2000's. It features Rad, one cool dude, as he explores his home town, helps his friends and the town's pedestrians, and discovers new abilities in challenge levels.

Rad is our college capstone project for Ferris State University. It is a short, one level demo and prototype created in Unreal Engine 4. We plan to take the game further in the future.

Rad has won numerous awards including:

  • E3 2018 College Game Competition Finalist
  • Ferris State University Doggie Award - Best Capstone
  • Ferris State University Doggie Award - Best Character Design (Iris)
